===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[relate]], to bear on
# {{lb|zh|formal|literary|classical|Cantonese|Hakka}} [[is]], [[am]], [[are]], to [[be]] (copula)
#: {{zh-x|其 母 係 ^北京人。|His mother '''is''' a native of Beijing.}}
#: {{zh-x|烏龍{lung4-2}茶 係 茶 嘅 一 種。|Oolong tea '''is''' a type of tea.|C-GZ}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Hakka}} [[yes]] (as answer to a question)

====Synonyms====
{{zh-dial|是}}

===Usage notes===
* {{qualifier|Cantonese}} Not to be confused with {{zh-l|喺|tr=hai2}}.
* {{qualifier|Cantonese|Hakka}} {{lang|zh|係／系}} is used in vernacular contexts, while {{zh-l|是}} is used in literary or formal contexts.

* {{zh-l|係數}}
